Title: Tour the Trading Post
Description:
<A flyer, carried by the wind, flaps into your hands.>

Fancy yourself a collector, trader, or adventurer? 

We've travelled all over Azeroth collecting goods of the finest quality for someone exactly like you!

Visit one of our outposts in Stormwind or Dornogal and browse all the latest goods!

--T&W Trading Post

<You squint to read the fine print.>

Be sure to present this flyer for some extra Trader's Tender!
ObjectivesText: Collect Trader's Tender from the Collector's Cache and tour the Trading Post.
CompletionText:
Welcome to the Tradin' Post! 

We've got goods from all over Azeroth for ye to collect. Would ye like to take a look?

Objectives.Text: Collect Trader's Tender from the Collector's Cache
Speak to a Trading Post Assistant
Look at this month's Trading Post inventory
